name: Engine Room (Talonos2)
description:
A multiplayer game with online PvP and local play (keyboard vs controller).  Make 3x3 squares of blocks to charge your ship, then match blocks on the colored tiles to fire lasers at your opponent or raise shields to protect yourself.

There is an unfortunate bug in the tutorial (singleplayer mode) that can prevent progress, so here are the controls:

- Arrow keys (Or D-Pad) to move
- "Z" and "C" (Or controller bumpers) to rotate pieces.
- Space bar (Or Controller A/X) to place blocks.
- To reset the board, hold "z" and "c" for a few seconds. This will remove all pieces, but will zero out your energy multiplier!

Come and visit our discord server at https://discord.gg/YBbbbfQ to find people to play against!
